body:
![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/2.png)

__[Klik sini untuk Bahasa Melayu](https://raiz.com.my/blog/raiz-rewards-lebih-banyak-jenama-untuk-anda/)__

__15/07/2022__

__Check out our new released brands__

Earn cash bonus when you shop with our brand partners and let your cash bonus get invested automatically!

Welcoming __6__ of our new brand partners on Raiz Rewards! Get cakes for your special ones with __CakeRush__, buy your best lingerie at __Triumph__, get your VPN at __NordVPN,__ buy beauty and health supplements from __Total Image,__ manage your health better with supplements from __Hiramino__, and check out China’s biggest domestic online shopping website, __Taobao!__

Shop online with our brand partners via Raiz Rewards and earn cash bonus of your purchase invested back into your Raiz account. \*

Just click the “__Shop Online Here__” button via Raiz Rewards and we’ll direct you to our brand partner’s app or website. Shop like normal, and you will be on your way to get your cash bonus.

So, as you shop, you invest!

*\*Terms & Conditions apply.*

### New Brands

__CakeRush__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/59.png)

__(+4.2% invested)__

__CakeRush__ is your reliable choice for same-day cake delivery in Klang Valley, Penang, Ipoh and Johor Bahru. Quality is guaranteed through their local bakers with decades of experience.

Shop online now with __CakeRush__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __4.2%__ of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Triumph__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/60.png)

__(+7% invested)__

__Triumph__ Malaysia offers a wide range of comfortable and fashionable bras and panties for women of all ages. Shop new arrivals online!

Shop online now with __Triumph__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __7%__ of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__NordVPN__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/61.png)

__(+28% invested)__

__NordVPN__ is the best VPN if you’re looking for peace of mind when on public Wi-Fi and private connection internet.

Shop online now with __NordVPN__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __28%__ of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Total Image__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/62.png)

__(+3.92% invested)__

__Total Image__ has been providing top-quality, safe & effective supplements for more than 20 years.

Shop online now with __Total Image__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __3.92%__ of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Hiramino__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/63.png)

__(+5.88% invested)__

__Hiramino__ is committed to promoting health and wellness by supplying customers with high-quality supplements.

Shop online now with __Hiramino__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __5.88%__ of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Taobao__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/64.png)

__(+up to 25% invested)__

__Taobao__ is China’s biggest domestic online shopping website that offers all kinds of products at incredibly low prices.

Shop online now with __Taobao__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __up to 25%__ of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

*\*All promotions are subjected to terms & conditions set by the brand partners.*

raiz rewards

__Need more details?__

Read the FAQ on Raiz Rewards [__here__](https://raiz.com.my/my-support/)

---

Want to earn __MORE__ rewards on top of your Raiz Rewards?

For each friend that you refer who starts investing with Raiz, Raiz will give you a referral bonus of RM10. Plus, your friend also gets an RM10 bonus! Refer your friends now!

[![Get RM10 Bonus](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/Get-RM10-Bonus.gif)](https://app.adjust.com/jsr?url=https%3A%2F%2Fye77.adj.st%2Finvite_friends%3Fadj_t%3D5tn8ue3_g8sxcfy%26adj_deep_link%3Draiz-my%253A%252F%252Finvite_friends%26adj_fallback%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fapp.raiz.com.my%26adj_deeplink_js%3D1)
